get.summary: Staff with access to Westfield APIs
get.description: Returns a list of staff limited to 100 enabled staff by default

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: Limits the result to staff with a specific role

200.description: List of staff

get.description: Returns a staff

200.description: A staff members

post.description: If you send the grant type `client_credentials` you must also provide the `client_id` and `client_secret`. If you send the grant type `password` you must also provide the `username` and `password`; you may optionally provide `client_id` and `client_secret`. If you send the grant type as `authorization_code`, you must provide the `client_id` and `client_secret` along with the `code` and `redirect_uri`.

200.description: Success
Success

get.summary: Returns Information about an OAuth Access token.

get.summary: Retrieve information about parking garages in a specific centre.
get.description: Retrieve a summary of details for all parking locations in a specific centre.

parameters.name: centre_id
parameters.description: Centre identifier. Request the parking garage details with centre_id. Lowercase code name for a specific centre.

parameters.description: Fields in response. Array that lists the fields requested. If empty or not supplied, all attributes will be returned.

parameters.description: Results page number. Specific page of results to request when paginating.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Results per page. Number of items per result set when paginating.

get.description: Request the details of a payment method.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the individual payment method.

patch.description: Request an update of the details associated with a payment method.

parameters.name: payment_method_data
parameters.description: Data to update the details associated with a payment method.

204.description: Successfully updated the payment method details.

422.description: Update request not processed. Returns an array of error messages explaining the problems with the provided attributes.

delete.description: Request a redaction of a payment method. Redacting a payment method does not delete it. Its transaction history is maintained as your permanent record . However, all sensitive information (e.g. PAN, CVV) is removed immediately and permanently. A redacted payment method can no longer be used for transactions since the account information will have been disposed of.

post.summary: Verify and retain a payment method.
post.description: Request verification of a payment method checking if it is in good standing. This call will also retain the payment method

parameters.name: verify_data
parameters.description: Data to verify and retain a payment method.

200.description: Verification request processed with success

422.description: Verification request not processed. Returns an array of error messages explaining the problems with the provided attributes.

post.description: Request the purchase of a payment method from JSON data in the request body. This transaction is used to authorize and capture a payment amount.

parameters.name: transaction_data
parameters.description: Data to create a purchase transaction.

422.description: Transaction not created. Returns an array of error messages explaining the problems with the provided attributes.

post.description: Request the authorization of a payment method from JSON data in the request body. This transaction is used to authorize a payment amount, and such payment method can be subsequently captured or voided in order to complete the transaction.

422.description: Transaction not created. Returns an array of error messages explaining the problems with the provided attributes.

post.description: Request the capture of funds previously reserved by an authorization.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Fields in response. Array that lists the fields requested. If empty or not supplied, all attributes will be returned.

200.description: Capture request processed with success

422.description: Transaction not processed. Returns an array of error messages explaining the problems with the provided attributes.

post.description: Request voiding (canceling) a transaction previously authorized.

200.description: Void request processed with success

422.description: Transaction not processed. Returns an array of error messages explaining the problems with the provided attributes.

post.description: Request the refund of a transaction. A refund is like a void, except it actually reverses a charge instead of just canceling a charge that hasn't yet been made.

200.description: Refund request processed with success

422.description: Transaction was not refunded. Returns an array of error messages explaining the problems with the provided attributes.

get.description: Request the details of a single transaction.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the individual transaction.

get.description: There are 3 possible ways to specify which account data should be returned. 1) Providing an access token, that will return all data related to the account associated to the token (only works with full accounts). 2) Providing an email address and a country, this way it will return the account details that holds that email for the provided country database (only works with partial accounts). 3) Providing a person_id, this way it will return the account associated with that identifier (only works with partial accounts).

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Fields in response. Array that lists the fields requested. If empty or not supplied, all attributes will be returned.

200.description: Account retrieved with success

404.description: Account with the provided email/country or person_id not found

422.description: Country parameter missing

patch.description: There are 3 possible ways to specify which account should be updated. 1) Providing an access token, that will return update the account associated to the token (only works with full accounts). 2) Providing an email address and a country, this way it will update the account that holds that email for the provided country database (only works with partial accounts). 3) Providing a person_id, this way it will update the account associated with that identifier (only works with partial accounts).

404.description: Account with the provided email/country or person_id not found

422.description: Unprocessable entity

post.description: Create a person account.

422.description: Unprocessable entity

422.description: Required is missing. Returns an array of error messages explaining the problems with the provided attributes.

423.description: Resource not updated because it's locked.
